Container.Name: OpenClaw
Container.Overview:
OpenClaw is an AI-powered personal assistant that runs locally and connects to Discord, Telegram, Slack, and more. It can manage your files, run commands, browse the web, control your smart home, and automate tasks - all while keeping your data private.
Features: - Multi-channel support (Discord, Telegram, Slack, WhatsApp, Signal, iMessage) - Local file access and command execution - Web browsing and research - Cron jobs and automation - Memory and context persistence - Extensible skills system - Web UI for management
FIRST TIME SETUP: 1. After starting, fix permissions: chown -R 1000:1000 /mnt/user/appdata/openclaw 2. Access Web UI at: http://YOUR-IP:18789?token=YOUR_GATEWAY_TOKEN
Documentation: https://docs.openclaw.dev
Container.Description: OpenClaw - AI-powered personal assistant. Connect to Discord, Telegram, Slack and more. Container runs as non-root (UID 1000).

Config.Name: Config Directory
Config.Description: OpenClaw config and state. Must be owned by UID 1000: chown -R 1000:1000 /mnt/user/appdata/openclaw

Config.Name: Workspace Directory
Config.Description: Agent workspace (SOUL.md, MEMORY.md, skills). Must be owned by UID 1000.

Config.Name: Projects Directory
Config.Description: Optional: Mount projects folder for coding/automation tasks. Leave blank to skip.

Config.Name: Gateway Token
Config.Description: Password for Web UI access. Access UI at: http://IP:18789?token=YOUR_TOKEN

Config.Name: Anthropic API Key
Config.Description: Your Anthropic API key for Claude models (get one at console.anthropic.com)

Config.Name: OpenAI API Key
Config.Description: Optional: OpenAI API key for GPT models
